com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.common.bases.baseobjects

Class BaseTrainable<MP extends BaseModelParameters,TP extends BaseTrainingParameters,KB extends KnowledgeBase<MP,TP>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.common.bases.baseobjects.BaseTrainable<MP,TP,KB>
  • Type Parameters:
    MP -
    TP -
    KB -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trainable<MP,TP>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseMLmodel, BaseMLrecommender, BaseWrapper, DataTransformer, FeatureSelection

    public abstract class BaseTrainable<MP extends BaseModelParameters,TP extends BaseTrainingParameters,KB extends KnowledgeBase<MP,TP>>
extends Object
implements Trainable<MP,TP>
    Base class for every Model of the Framework. This includes Machine Learning Models, Data Transformers, Feature Selectors etc.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String dbName
      The name of the Database where we persist our data.
      protected KB knowledgeBase
      The KnowledgeBase instance of the algorithm.
      protected org.slf4j.Logger logger
      The Logger of all algorithms.

      • fit

        public void fit(Dataset trainingData,
                TP trainingParameters)
        Trains a Machine Learning model using the provided training data. This method is responsible for initializing appropriately the algorithm and then calling the _fit() method which performs the learning.
        Specified by:
